After waiting about 10 years to play this game, I have finally gotten around to it. I am about halfway through the game, and the game has changed what I think about PC gaming, and gaming in general. The amount of interesting backstory and creativity involved in the game is fenomenal. I keep wanting to learn more about the games background, even while I am sitting there playing it. I would completely recommend this game to anyone in the gaming community as it develops a great impact on the gaming culture. Thank you Gabe and the Valve Developers who worked on this work of art. You have most definitely changed my life for the better.

This is the game I installed Steam for, back in 2004. I have screenshots dated 19th of November 2004 onwards (HL2 released on the 16th) and having recently played through again just recently, the storyline, voice-acting,graphics and sheer emotional engagement still hold up, as does the vertigo-inducing bridge traversal section which is a video-game "15 minutes" that will stay with me forever, (that, and the entire Ravenholm section). This is a classic that every video game fan should play through at least once.
One of the most amazing single player games I've ever played.

This game is just awsome. Nuff said. The storyline is great, and allthough the game is 10 years old, it is still great. You have multiple weapons, and sometimes the aimingsystem could be better, but overall the game is a 8 out of 10.

This is the best game I've ever played and I highly recommend that you buy it and play it. 10/10

First of all the game's strongest suit is its atmosphere. From the breathtakingly beautiful highway 17 or the terrifying city of Ravenholm, Valve has successfully been able to suck the player into their own world. What sets this apart from other games is how the environments are so beautiful and so believable makes you want to just roam around the game taking it all in.

The gameplay is excellent, the gun play is solid and responsive. Each weapon is different in its own way making it fun to shoot down enemies by shooting them with you 9mm or de-atomizing them with the pulse-rifle. Really simple, really fun.

The physics in this game are the best I've ever seen (the water effects are superb btw), better than some modern day games (*cough* call of duty). Words cannot describe how fun it is to use the gravity gun. Being able to interact with the environment and being able to kill enemy’s with whatever you want is extremely fun.

Graphics have this Valve style to them, making it really realistic, really beautiful, and really immersive.

There is no reason why you shouldn't have this game in your library, it's cheap, and it's one of the best god damn games ever made.
One of my favorite games of all time.

5/10
The story line is a bit meh. I had to force myself through a lot of this and the fact that I was bored without internet is the main reason I got through it... It is a bit glitchy at times.
I love this game and for ten dollars you can't beat the price if you're thinking about getting it it is a lot of fun!
such a classic of a game. this should be in everyones library

This game is amazing. This game wont try to shove a character you dont like down your throat or force you to do ridiculous tasks. You grow to love the characters and miss them when your alone. You can understand whats going on and plan ahead instead of having your screen constantly blurred my blood or fog like any COD game. The weapons are simple and dont provide you with a uncontrolable amount of recoil. Learn to really fight and not abuse ironsights. Find yourself so attached to the environment that you begin to talk to the characters and yourself half the time. This game will leave you proccessing it in your brain for weeks after and begging for more. A game so simple and so easy paced you will understand and capture every moment. Who cares how old it is! It puts any FPS story in the trash and throws at you the greatest story ever made! You are Gordon Freeman! Be the bad ass with a freaking crowbar! Buy... This... Game!!!!!
Best Valve game of all time, 10/10. This game is amazing, over 10 hours of gameplay.

This game's off the hook. Even though it dosn't have a objective of what to do next in most games, but it brings a lot action and puzzle solving througout the game. Half-Life 2 is by far the true monster of PC gaming. 10 out of 10, hands down.

Half-Life 2 je titul, který mi tenkrát nějakým způsobem unikl a zahrál jsem si ho až po 9 letech od jeho původního vydání. A to je právě účel této recenze - zachránit ty, co udělali stejnou chybu před minutím něčeho tak skvělého. Pokud jste ještě nehráli, přerušte aktuální činnost a chopte se páčidla. Nebudete litovat až do konce druhé epizody, která bohužel končí nedokončeným, ale i tak skvělým příběhem.
Nativní linuxová verze nemá chybu a optimalizace je skvělá.

Качество этой игры поражает даже спустя много лет после выхода, и это касаеться практически каждого аспекта. Физика, графика (чёрт, да тут модельки песонажей смотрятся получше чем в играх выпущеных через 5-7 лет), музыкальное сопровождение в купе с отличной историей (очень грамотно и интересным образом поданой) до сих пор держат планку качества на уровне, на мой взгляд непревзойдённом.

Эта игра обладатель 35 наград "лучшая игры года". Что я могу сказать? Это так. Несомненно. Оцениваем по 10-ти бальной шкале. Графика - на высоте, 10 баллов. Сюжет? Как вы вообще это сделали? Это же гениально! Все захватывает. Но все же, иногда есть и косяки, но было наверное 2 раза, все что мне не понравилось. 9.8 баллов. Геймплей? Просто восхитительно, все удобно и легко. 10 баллом. Что я могу сказать про нее вообще? Эта игра действительна достоина 35 наград. Я ее прошел не раз. Советую всем, ведь такого шедевра я еще не видел.

An absolute classic, a titan of the genre, and pretty much the yardstick by which I measure almost every other FPS game. The story is amazing, the gameplay is involved yet intuitive, the design is pretty and there's some actual HUMOR. People writing characters with depth and shit. It's also one of the few games that can represent women slightly better than the majority of games out there. Also, gravity gun in Ravenholm. Totally made the game for me.

Originally I got this in order to play Gary's Mod with some friends, it sat un-played on my desktop for a while until I eventually gave it a go, It was definitely worth it. The plot is great and I loved the ending. Whilst there are some rather tedious chapters (the air boat ones....) and the start is a bit dull, I have still replayed the story before and enjoyed it nearly as much as the first time (well... i say nearly, because the beginning gets a bit boring the second time through but once you get the the climax in the later few chapters, it gets just as good as it was the first time around). So all in all, its a bit slow in the beginning and there are two annoyingly tedious chapters but that doesn't change the fact its a great game and I still recommend it!

I genuinely cant believe I haven't given this masterpiece of a game a review yet but if there's any time to do it its after my 4th play through and doing 100% of the games achievements. 

Half Life 2 put simply is among the best and most clever FPS ever made. Some claim its achievements or ideas are no longer relevant because they've been copied and adapted several times over. Similar things are said about the brilliant original as well. This is mostly not true. Half Life 2 is a game of striking sci-fi imagery and audio rarely seen in games. Its a game where each chapter feels like a separate game and mood entirely. A great game is a great game, no matter how many imitators may draw from it.

This game blew my mind when I played it when I was 13, even long after its release its intoxicatingly sombre game world and high action hooked me in. Even now my feelings haven't changed much at all since then.

I'm suprised I haven't reviewed Half Life 2 before, so here goes.
I've never seen a game that's perfect, no game can be perfect. But the Half Life series comes darn close to it, the only reasons why they aren't perfect is due to the AI and ocasional physics bugs. But I lose sight of those when I play it, as it has a wonderful feel to it, the world feels alive, which a lot of games seem to miss. Characters are fantasticly designed, and the voice acting was excellent for its time and still is.
In all, Half Life 2 and the series are wonderfully developed, memorable shooters that have a special place in my heart.

I enjoyed this game a ton. I never felt like the gameplay was getting stale either since the story progressed at a steady pace. And there is a follower who you actually care about and you don't feel forced to lug her around like she's some puppy that you forgot at the puppy mill since you are in to that kind of shit.... Where was I?Aw yes. Alyx Vance was a great supporting character and although Gordon Freeman never really talked, she did all the talking for you and she was hot. Where am I going with this review??? Anyways, this was actually a great game, I could see how this revolutionized story telling, first person shooters, and action/adventure games during its era. A must play for all people on steam. Eleven out of ten. Gabe, you should be proud.

Half-Life 2 - нашумевший в своё время сиквел к Half-Life. Игре уже 10 лет, однако при этом она до сих пор держит высокую планку качества.

Игра является продолжением первой части. Спустя несколько лет, G-man вовращает Гордона из стазиса, решив его использовать в своих целях. За время отсутствия Фримена, прошли довольно глобальные изменения в мире. Планета была захвачена могущественной инопланетной организацией, именуемой Советом Альянса. Большиство людей, стали жертвами и рабами захватчиков, однако были и те кто пытался сопротивлятся. Небольшие отряды повстанцев, не теряли надежду спастись и вернуть Землю обратно. Роль главного повстанца сыграет бывшый сотрудник научного комлекса Black Mesa.

Первое, что на тот момент бросалось в глаза, это новый движок Source. Помимо прекрасной графики, крутой анимации, движок имел отличную техническую составляющую. Большая качественная работа была проведена с физикой. Все предметы, оружие, техника, повинуются физике, с учётом их массы, трения и силы тяжести. На этой основе сделано немало различных простеньких головоломок.

Тем не менее игра является классическим представителем жанра шутер от первого лица. Так же игра сохранила все классические традиции первой части. К примеру за действиями игры, мы наблюдаем исключительно из глаз главного героя, без каких то видео-вставок или разрыве во времени. Так же Гордон Фримен молчит на протяжении всей игры. Ну и конечно загадка серии номер один, таинственый человек в костюме с кейсом.

По части геймплея, игра нам предлагает куда больше разноообразия нежели первый HL. И если в первом, место действия в основном проходило на територрии научного комплекса в пустыне, где большую часть времени, игрок проводил в стенах лаборатории, то во второй части, разнообразие локаций на порядок выше. Захваченый, полуразрушенный город восточной европы, побережье, мрачный атмосферный городок Рейвенхольм, тюрьма, огромная Цитадель. Все эти места помимо всего прочего, красиво воссозданы, а в некоторых прекрасно передана атмосфера(Рейвенхольм).

Если в первой части основными противника были инопланетные существа, в перемешку с солдатами, посланными на зачистку лаборатории, то во второй таковыми являются солдаты Альянса. Сражениям с зомби и другими существами уделено куда меньше времени. Тем не менее игра постоянно держит в напряжении, а качественно поданый геймплей и продуманный сюжет мотивируют играть не прерываясь, до самого конца.

Кроме основной геймплейной составляющей игры, а именно перестрелки с врагами и убийство мутантов, игра так же предлагает нам и другие развлечения. Часто встречаются не сложные, однако вполне продуманые логические задачки, нам дадут возможность покататся на багги по побережью и на воздушной подушке по каналам города.

В игре не много оружия, однако представленных экземпляров вполне хватает, для того чтобы устроить настоящий беспредел на улицах Сити 17. Хотя модели оружия другие, однако типы и виды остались такими же. Ломик, пистолет, дробовик, атомат, арбалет, базука и гранаты. Однако, ещё было добавлено устройство под названием Грави-пушка, которая полностью заменяет все функции ломика. Теперь один из символов Half-Life, стал самым бесполезным предметом в инвентаре Гордона.

Несмотря на то, что большую часть игры прийдется ходить в одиночестве, и сражаться с врагами собственными силами, во второй части у нас будут союзники. Это некоторые повстанцы, Аликс и её Пёс, и даже Муравьиные львы. Сам же AI был намного лучше проработан. Как враги так и союзники вели себя вполне адекватно. Редко когда замечал баги или какие то проблемы с этим.

[h1] Отличная игра, прекрасное продолжение серии, красивая графика, реалистичная физика, хорошо продуманный сюжет и яркие персонажи.

Оценка: 10/10 [/h1]
In 2008, this is the game that got me back into video games.  10/10

Half Life 2 is a hybrid uncommon amongst most FPS games. Combining elements of Horror, Action, Role-Playing, and even Puzzle, this game succeeds as both a thought-provoking game and satisfying shooter. 

Half Life 2 is easily accessbile to all gamers. You don't need to have played the original to comprehend the plot, as they are minimally connected. Past significant events are thoroughly explained, as you easily get up on your feet and immerse yourself in this apocalyptic world dominated by blood-hungry aliens.

The plot is subtle. Nothing is over-dramatized or exaggerated. The game flows in real-time, so there are no gaps between events. The game proceeds very quickly, and due to that fact some might say this is a short game, but it's not without it's challenges, secrets, and easter eggs. There is enough content to keep you playing for hours, and even come back again after you beat it.

So don't sit by waiting for Half Life 3, just purchase this one right now! I recommend "The Orange Box", because for $20, you  get this game, and it's 3 successors. Not to mention "Portal" as well, the 'sister' game to Half Life.

Half-Life 2 is by far one of the greatest PC games I have ever played. Although this game came out ten years ago, I had recently just bought it since I just got my laptop in March.
   Now what makes you so immersed into this game? The fact that this game feels so alive, like the wolrd actually once existed. There is never a cutscene that cuts out of the in-game engine, so throughout the whole game you feel like you are travelling through a GIANT world. The gameplay feels so smooth in general, the weapons feel great to use, along with the movement of yourself.
   10/10 especially for a ten year-old game.
its really fun
One of the best games in video game history. The story is amazing among the great graphics and entertaining physics.
